Password Page Settings

You can manage the way password page looks like.

1. Logo settings#

You can change, edit or remove the logo.

2. Logo width#

Customize logo size. Recommended width is 32px.

3. Show countdown#

You can enable/disable the countdown.

4. Countdown date#

Manage the date to start a countdown. (E.g.: Dec 31, 2021 00:00:00)

5. Show social icons#

You can enable/disable the Social.

6. Show â€˜powered byâ€™ link#

Enable/disable the link to the e-commerce platform website.

7. Show theme byâ€™ link#

Enable/disable the link to the theme developersâ€™ website.
